name: Tom Sawyer - The Great Obstacle Course
name_original: Tom Sawyer - The Great Obstacle Course
description: Play this 3D endless runner in which Tom Sawyer is rushing on a forest path, trying to avoid obstacles and collect coins. The longer you survive the run, the faster it goes, and more coins spawns to be collected. At the end of a run, you can exchange your coins for resources in the free associated mobile game (this part is optional).
